Description: This position is derived from Liepin's job description: 1. Responsible for the daily systematic operation of the distribution center of E.Land Group Mall, and improve the system, rules and procedures of "Wei-Ke Distribution"; 2. Responsible for the establishment, formulation and implementation of relevant distribution communities Community and operation plan to increase user stickiness, ensure user activity, and achieve relevant performance goals; 3. Establish and improve distributor community operation strategies and process specifications to promote the healthy development of the community; 4. Follow-up of operational results data 5. Have product thinking, and have relevant insights on the conversion path of users entering products to promote conversion and improvement; 6. Formulate phased work plans and goals, strive to coordinate resources and implement them. 7. Efficiently complete other tasks assigned by superiors. Job Requirements: 1. Strong copywriting skills. 2. Experience in offline shopping guide management training in the clothing industry is preferred. 3. Have management team experience. 4. Independently promote and complete at least one project. 5. Familiar with customer data management and community marketing, email marketing, circle of friends marketing, telemarketing, SMS marketing, etc. 6. Strong sense of innovation, high expectations for work and oneself, mobile Internet or related experience is preferred; 7. , Have practical experience in promoting online and offline activities, be able to independently write and follow up the implementation of event promotion plans; 8. Love learning, thinking, summarizing, and writing, and have a strong curiosity about new things on the Internet;

This position comes from the job content of Liepin: 1. Responsible for managing the daily work of the media team; 2. Pay attention to Internet media trends, be familiar with various types of Internet media and mobile new media, and be able to analyze and evaluate the specific implementation effects of various Internet media; 3. , Lead the Internet media team to complete the media planning plan, and participate in customer proposals; 4. Coordinate the cooperation relationship between the media team and other departments, and follow up the implementation and implementation of the plan, and have overall control over the quality of the submitted planning plan Ability; 5. Lead the team to negotiate, develop, maintain and manage media resources. Job Requirements: 1. Familiar with various types of Internet advertising media resources, and have a certain ability to develop resources; Familiar with FMCG, beauty, mother and baby, automobile and other multi-field media resources are preferred; 2. Good at business negotiations and cost control; 3. Have media skills Ability to write plans and propose proposals; 4. Strong experience in team management, good at coordinating the work of the marketing team.

This position comes from Liepin. Responsibilities: 1. Coordinate and arrange the daily itinerary of the group leaders; 2. Draft the daily official documents and reports of the group leaders; 4. Responsible for the organization and arrangement of the meeting affairs of the group leaders, and remind, investigate and implement the resolutions of the meeting; 5. Receive visiting customers; 6. Responsible for handling other tasks temporarily assigned by the group leaders. Job requirements: 1. Bachelor degree or above, graduated from 985, 211 or well-known overseas universities; 2. Work carefully, have a sense of responsibility, strong learning ability and executive ability, and good communication and coordination skills.
